Recovery A fatal error has occurred from which there is no recovery. We recommend reinstalling the application. You have been sent an email with the necessary information for the recovery of your account. Once the process is complete, you will be able to login with your credentials. Send Necessary permissions For the correct operation of the application, it is necessary to grant permanent location permissions and phone management permission. Go to Permissions>Location>Always Allow and Permissions>Phone>Allow Grant permissions Enter your email to continue with the recovery of your account. Your password must be at least 8 characters long. Link Account Link Enter your Ticket credentials to associate your account Welcome Welcome to the Ticket platform. You can now enjoy our services. Calendar Remember Add events to system calendar for a better integration. Ask Security Remember credentials at startup. Authentication will be requested only when your session expires. Cancel Buy Subscription Plan Trading History Buy Recharge Transfer Pay Another action Verify payment Share The payment has been canceled, so you can\'t continue. Rate Share your opinion Comment Version Developed by XETID in collaboration with the Central University \"Marta Abreu\" of Las Villas.Ticket: Cuba\'s central reservation system, which allows to manage online reservations of services belonging to state, cooperative, private or mixed sector entities, through its service catalog. Among its main functionalities is the reservation in the days and shifts of preference for the user according to the existing availabilities, in case there is no availability, the waiting room can be used as another functionality within Ticket. Payment of the service through secure platforms (ENZONA). Possibility of booking for different beneficiaries. Cancellation of tickets and obtaining the amount paid according to the terms and conditions of each provider. Synchronize reservations with the phone calendar, as well as receive notifications from the system and rate the services received. Changelog Give us opinion
